website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking to stabilize Amazon Echo, Echo Plus, UE Boom or other similar models, there's no need to look further.
pros: The design and modern look are appealing and blend in with the rest of your home
They are simple in use and in design
cons: There are only a few colors to choose from

customer_reviews.title: I couldnt be happier with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Due to finding my Alexa on the floor a handful of times because of the family pets behaving so well while I was away, yuk-yuk, I realized I can't be the only person dealing with this and investigated a solution to the problem. Outside of velcroing my end table and the bottom of my Alexa, i came upon Wasserstein's Alexa Speaker Stand. I couldnt be happier with my purchase. Its affordable, stylish, and solves the problem of it getting knocked over. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Stand
customer_reviews.text: The product is very nice and sturdy. It makes the Amazon Echo look very nice. I paid a reduced price for it which was an excellent price. I have had this on my wishlist since it was introduced to the market. The reason I did not purchase it, was due to the price. The normal price for just a stand to hold the Echo is not worth it. I do admit it is well made and better than all the others I have seen. All the Wasserstein products I have purchased have been great and they are well made. Since it's price has gone down I bought another to place my other speaker when it arrives.
customer_reviews.author: Kaffeguy

customer_reviews.title: Safety for my Echo
customer_reviews.text: Fits great. Looks great. Now I feel like my Echo Plus has a safety net. I have to add, that the Echo bass now has more bass being in the stand rather than just standing on the table. *** I have three of these stands now. I won't review again, should there be another purchase. I love the stands. My cats can't knock over the Echos (really big plus) The newest one was for 2nd gen Echo. 2nd gen is shorter and fatter. The Echo is about an inch taller than the stand, all buttons are accessible. It fits like a glove due to Echo gaining a chubbier waist.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Alexa Protected
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this speaker stand for my new best friend, Alexa (aka Amazon Echo.) I decided the kitchen was the best location to keep the Echo, so I purchased this to protect her from toppling over by accidental bumps. The sturdy stand matches the black Echo and looks beautiful on my kitchen counter.
customer_reviews.author: Linschwa

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. I have not actually figured out yet what the real benefit of this unit is other than maybe keeping your Echo from being knocked over easily? If that is the purpose then I think it works great. It looks ok and is simple enough. I am not sure if it is really worth the price though.
customer_reviews.author: Clarence Wittwer

customer_reviews.title: A Must for any Echo owner
customer_reviews.text: Bought this stand when I got the Echo back in October, for a Christmas gift for my wife. Finally am able to review it since we finally opened it up and used it. The stand came well packed and looked great coming out of the box. It complements the Echo. Makes it look even better then it already dose., As far as piece of mind go's? The echo will not topple over or be banged into with this stand in place. This is a MUST. And well worth the price. Great job Wasserstein.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Perfect Accessory for Echo
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two stands; one black, and one blue. They arrived on time and perfectly packaged. I simply opened them and set each echo into the stand. They both provided some stability to the tall echo without taking an excessive amount of space n the table tops. Love the look too. The blue ring in the bedroom compliments the white Echo perfectly. Very satified with both the quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Cole

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised and More
customer_reviews.text: Tough little stand and easy on the eyes. Easy to set up, too- just slip in the Echo and arrange the cord and plug it in. It took just a few seconds. The non-slip pads and the weight of the Echo add to the stability of the stand. It had no affect on the responsiveness of the Echo and it has eased my mind, knowing the Echo was finally protected from cats, clods, and vacuum cleaners. 420 appropriate.
customer_reviews.author: ShknBkVgn

customer_reviews.title: Added security for Echo
customer_reviews.text: I have three Echos and I use this style stand for each of them. It offers added protection against knock-overs or being banged into. It adds balance and a wider stand area between the Echo and the wall if you place it close to a wall. I highly recommend this item for anyone who uses the Echo.
customer_reviews.author: Avalon100

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: This product looks exactly as what I had expected. It secures my Echo well and looks good. However, I was hoping that I could leave the battery base attached and just take the Echo out as needed. Not the case. I need to take battery base off before using the stand and during the summer when I'm mostly outside, just not use the stand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Alexa Hub  Good to have
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Alexa unit to begin upgrading my electrical outlets and appliances, It works properly but I have not been able to utilize it to its full capacity since I have not upgraded enough appliance.
customer_reviews.author: kojacsmith

customer_reviews.title: Serves its Purpose!
customer_reviews.text: Stylish and functional. My dog knocked over my Echo a couple of times when she bumped into a speaker that I had the Echo sitting on. That is no longer a problem with this stand. I think that it looks very sharp, is durable and a perfect design.
customer_reviews.author: Tony P.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful addition to your Echo that has great functionality!
customer_reviews.text: A perfect blend pairing up with my Echo! Very nice design and structure and most importantly, besides looking quite well on a table, it actually works keeping Echo more stabilized and protective of our roaming and nosy cats.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W. Hecht

customer_reviews.title: Money Well Spent
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier with this little stand. Has some weight to it and wants to stick down to a smooth surface, so I can feel secure in knowing my Alexa (in her Echo) is safe and sound. Money well spent, a must have if you own an Echo.
customer_reviews.author: David Schulz

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice stand for the Echo
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice stand for the Echo. Item was delivered on time, it came pre-assembled so I just took it out of the box and slipped my Echo into it. Very easy. I have cats who have come close to knocking it over many times. Glad I won't have to worry about it anymore. Item has grips on the bottom and a nice weight to it. Reccomend this to anyone with an Echo.
customer_reviews.author: sairuhxd

customer_reviews.title: No more slipping
customer_reviews.text: For the price this stand is great! No more worrying about knocking it off the counter or slipping around. Make sure you peel off the plastic on the non-skid feet. Fit the ECHO PLUS 1st gen perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: red

customer_reviews.title: Animal-resistant Echo stand proves its worth
customer_reviews.text: The product description included a reference to offering protection against Echo getting knocked over by inquisitive cats. Turns out, we have one, so the stand, which is on an easily-accessible end table, proved to be an immediate success. And it looks nice, too.
customer_reviews.author: Peter R. Longini

customer_reviews.title: My Speaker Stand! The company was great to work with.
customer_reviews.text: I love my speaker stand. Made very nicely. I only have 4 stars because my first order came damaged not due to shipping. The company resent it out and everything was just perfect. Don't hesitate to order.
customer_reviews.author: Denise K.

customer_reviews.title: ok but can't plug in audio cable
customer_reviews.text: for the price it looks nice and would be fine if you never need to use the aux out jack to hook into a bigger amp/ speaker. I cut a small bit off the lower rail to allow access , no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: tavegas

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so it's easier to keep people's hands off my echo. Also to help protect it if it tips. It doesn't really get touched so I can't speak of quality of build. It fits the echo perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Spurlin

customer_reviews.title: This seemed a better solution. It fits and works nicely with the ...
customer_reviews.text: I accidently knocked over one echo and broke it. This seemed a better solution. It fits and works nicely with the surrounding. I even had compliments on it already. Thanks for coming up with a basic but useful tool.
customer_reviews.author: Robert White/ Mary White

customer_reviews.title: Looks very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very pleased with this stand. My Amazon Echo sits on my kitchen counter. With a lot of Holiday visitors, I didn’t want anyone knocking over my Echo! The stand arrived quickly, it was a cinch to put together and it did its job of protecting my Echo from being knocked over.
customer_reviews.author: Lingrif

customer_reviews.title: The stand is very attractive and arrived exactly as described ...
customer_reviews.text: The stand is very attractive and arrived exactly as described. It does the job and looks very stylish sitting on the kitchen counter. I ordered it to raise my Echo off of the counter and offer it some protection and it does that. I would not hesitate purchasing this product again if I ever buy another Echo.
customer_reviews.author: R. Martins

customer_reviews.title: Alexa looking good!
customer_reviews.text: Other similar products out there, but this is aesthetically the best. Acrylic scratches easy and I was prickly in my inspection out of the box. No blemishes. High quality item at a reasonable price. Certainly does its job in keeping Alexa on her feet and looking pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Sam's Dad

customer_reviews.title: Classy and Practical
customer_reviews.text: This stand is as close to perfection as one can get. It arrive pre-assembled and ready to use. Adds a lot of class to with my Echo Plus!
customer_reviews.author: W. H. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Quality Echo Stand!
customer_reviews.text: My echo stand arrived in two days and was packaged to protect my purchase. I t is made of a quality plastic and looks great, as it belongs to/with my echo. I purchase to protect my echo from accidental bumps and falls, it is doing it's job beautifully on both counts.
customer_reviews.author: CJB

customer_reviews.title: Not a Snug Fit
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid speaker stand that gets the job done. My only issue is that the opening for the speaker is much larger than my UE Boom2 speaker. It's not a snug fit.
customer_reviews.author: John W

customer_reviews.title: The product is just OK, Does what it is ...
customer_reviews.text: The product is just OK, Does what it is supposed to do. The communication with this company however, is quite deficient and would only deserve 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure if I really needed this product but I am so glad I purchased it. Stand is sturdy and won't let Echo tip over (or my cat knock it off the shelf. ) Design is sleek and modern but will fit any decor. Arrived on time, well packaged. Highly recommend! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Abby M.

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: this is a gift. I did not use, therefore I can"t rate this product. I did see the product looks good and amazon echo fits perfect
customer_reviews.author: togi

customer_reviews.title: Classy, protective, aesthetic
customer_reviews.text: Great stand for Alexa. Looks classy and protects Alexa from getting knocked over. Bought one for each Alexa!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Sipes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Product! At last a device that was ready ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Product ! At last a device that was ready to use and provided protection for my ECHO from my cat. Great transaction and thoughtful design.
customer_reviews.author: Selwyn S. Elledge

customer_reviews.title: Not bulky or an eye soar but just the right size and most importantly it is sturdy and protective from knockovers
customer_reviews.text: I just received my echo stand and it was exactly the way I wanted it to be! Not bulky or an eye soar but just the right size and most importantly it is sturdy and protective from knockovers!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ellen Emiola

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for looks only and it serves the purpose. The Echo does not require any support. Rather pricey but worth the appearence
customer_reviews.author: Ray Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Safe Sturdy and Attractive
customer_reviews.text: Lovely piece of art as well as a functional stand for my Echo. It was easy to install echo. It seems to be very stable and safe. I love it and have 2 for my devices placed on different floors in my abode. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: C. Rider

customer_reviews.title: I think it was the PERFECT add on
customer_reviews.text: If you think that the Echo might get knocked over then you really need this stand. It matches my contemporary décor perfectly and it makes the Echo Stand out! I think it was the PERFECT add on , thxs everyone, great job!!
customer_reviews.author: Tom C.

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE FOR YOUR ECHO
customer_reviews.text: The speaker stand provides extra stability plus an aesthetic quality to the Echo. The fit is perfect and the design makes the unit a conversation piece. Alexa will be happy you bought the stand.
customer_reviews.author: rdail

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Echo Stand!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stand! Very stable for my Echo. Sound not impeded at all. With kids and a cat, I didn’t want my Echo taking a tumble. This tasteful stand fits the bill!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen H. Jett

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and works great for stability for my Echo 2nd Generation speaker all at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Deuce

customer_reviews.title: VERY STYLISH
customer_reviews.text: I got the Echo & stand for my daughter & son-in-law for Christmas. They absolutely love both. The stand is very stylish & they have it right on their breakfast bar so they can access Alexa whenever...
customer_reviews.author: Lynne happily living in the sunshine state

customer_reviews.title: These do not fit the gen2 pluse
customer_reviews.text: This does not fit the gen2 plus. Got two for gifts have send them back
customer_reviews.author: Sean D

customer_reviews.title: Great stand for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love it it looks great Now I don’t have to be afraid that it will tip over. The stand is not made of cheap plastic it is well made
customer_reviews.author: I Pena

customer_reviews.title: Perffct solution to prevent tipping.
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect solution for preventing the Echo fro being knocked over. Not only does it look nice but it did not require any assembly. Also there are slots for the cord. Price is right.
customer_reviews.author: novice

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit Echo Plus
customer_reviews.text: The one I received does NOT fit my Echo Plus. The diameter of the Plus is too large.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Stable stand
customer_reviews.text: Impressive stand/holder for the Echo. Appears to be a good buy for the quality received.
customer_reviews.author: The Scamper

customer_reviews.title: Like the design and look of it though
customer_reviews.text: It really stabilized the older version of the Echo which I had inadvertently knocked over several times. Not so much needed for the newer version which is heavier. Like the design and look of it though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again and highly recommend...
customer_reviews.text: So many to choose from and I chose this one. I am glad I did. It is a really nice looking stand and very well made.No screw holes on top, beautiful finish. The slots for the cord is great...
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Nice Stand
customer_reviews.text: This stand is well made and adds additional stability/protection for our Alexa.
customer_reviews.author: Ldj

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this speaker to anyone who owns an Amazon Echo ...
customer_reviews.text: This will be my second speaker stand that I have purchased from this company. The reason why I purchased a stand for my Echo is to keep it clean when I move it to a different location in my home. Yes, I would recommend this speaker to anyone who owns an Amazon Echo device.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product, just what was needed to prevent t product from getting knocked over.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great, already have two and bought two more for gifts..

customer_reviews.title: Really give an Art Deco look to the Echo. ...
customer_reviews.text: Really give an Art Deco look to the Echo. I feel a bit more confident that it won't get knocked over, and keeps it a bit safer.

customer_reviews.title: Best looking echo stand
customer_reviews.text: Perfect echo stand. Looks great and really fits not like other supposedly echo stands

customer_reviews.title: I love this stand!
customer_reviews.text: I love the stand and will be ordering more since I have several Echo's. I have the black and it is so stylish!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect fit for my new 2nd gen Echo. It's very stable.

customer_reviews.title: Really like the looks...
customer_reviews.text: Fits my echo plus like a glove and protects it as well...Really worth the money...

customer_reviews.title: A classy stand for Alexa....
customer_reviews.text: So happy I ordered this stand for my office desk....It completes the look for my Amazon Echo.....

customer_reviews.title: keeps off counter
customer_reviews.text: i like that it keeps off counter and is stylish.
customer_reviews.author: CAROLE W.

customer_reviews.title: I don't want to give this product a bad review because it does a good job if you ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't want to give this product a bad review because it does a good job if you are only inserting the Echo. The problem I had was that I needed the Stand to fit with the Battery Base added to the Echo. It does not fit with Battery Base. I called and e-mailed Customer Service before buying the Stand and they said it should fit, but it did not.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Connelly

customer_reviews.title: Stand for the Amazon echo
customer_reviews.text: I used it for my echo and it fits very good and it arrived on time

customer_reviews.title: The echo fit perfect
customer_reviews.text: The echo fit perfectly and it adds much needed stability for it
customer_reviews.author: JerryH

customer_reviews.title: Nice Stand.
customer_reviews.text: Works well, looks great. No scratches or cracks in any of the plastic, and my Echo still responds the same. Will buy another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nieski

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Product is exactly as shown. Fits echo perfectly and has a nice weighted feel to it. Make echo very sturdy and enhances its look . Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: cheryl l. randles

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and useful as well.
customer_reviews.text: Attractive stand for Amazon Echo. It looks like it will give the Echo some additional stability on our den end table. I am glad I added it to my order.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Brock

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Product is exactly as described. I am a Prime member so received it in two days. Makes the Amazon Echo stable on the side table. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Berecca

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly and dusty
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box was dusty with some material. I was going to look the other way then noticed that the top edges in the back were not alligned. Worst of all, it wobbled! thus making Alexa even less secure. Currently debating if should test luck with trying to purchase a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: Solidly built and the echo fits right it. Definitely stabilizes it and makes it less likely to get knocked off a table or tipped.
customer_reviews.author: L. Haft

customer_reviews.title: Most reliable company
customer_reviews.text: The stand looks very nice and very sturdy. A very nice company to do business with.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Isakoff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect design
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Particularly like the slots so that you don't have to unplug and re-plug the power connector. Works great. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: jwooding

customer_reviews.title: The perfect compliment
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this speaker stand as a gift for my brother's Amazon Echo. I haven't given it to him yet, but tried it out "for size" on mine. It's very nice looking and should be an excellent stablizing stand. The perfect compliment to an already great product!
customer_reviews.author: Lori D.

customer_reviews.title: I really like this stand for my Echo
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stand for my Echo. It is very sturdy and will keep Alexa from being knocked over on the counter. Just what I wanted!

I like the stand for a couple reasons, 1 it acts as a holder so that it doesn't tip over, and 2. it cushions the bottom just a bit which is quite useful in my house since echo stays on my kitchen bar. Great product for the short duration that I've had it!

customer_reviews.text: Well constructed and reasonably priced. My application is to secure the Amazon Echo to a counter-top on my sailboat. Would be nice to have a double-sided pad pre-cut for the bottom, but a few strips of 3M Commander and it's held firmly in place.

customer_reviews.title: Compliments the Echo perfectly.
